archimate:Folder.name: 5.6.2.2 Distributed Authentication Endpoint Services
archimate:Folder.documentation:
Set of authentication protocol endpoints used at each site.
Each endpoint serves authentication and authorization information over a variety of authentication and authorization protocols, eg. LDAP, OAUTH2, kerberos. The service is oriented to support protocols used in open science. Each endpoint caches information from the Master Identity Management Services in order to provide service if it becomes unavailable.
